Bio

Dani R born in Cordoba, Argentina. He is a producer Minimal / Minimal Deep - Tech in full growth. he began to be interested in music in his adolescence using the piano as a connector. In August 2019 he began his career as a DJ and in July 2020 as a producer. So much in his mixes as in his tracks, the cheerful synths predominate, classic house, generating a pleasant atmosphere, always preserving his minimalist bass to never lose the groove. In his short career as a producer he has been able to seal his music on labels such as NoPreset, Urban Garden, Fahren Lab, Mtion.
